content.title: 9 days to go: Could not be more thankful for the support received so far!
content.creator:
Heitor Schalkwijk
February 21, 2025
content.content:
The first steps into making this happen have been made.

Feedback was received, lessons were learned.
All part of the growing that FolioSeven will do to reach its full potential.
Still 9 days to go and FolioSeven has heard no bell just yet.

Thank you all so so much ‚ù§Ô∏è

content.title: First week down! feeling the love
content.creator:
Heitor Schalkwijk
February 6, 2025
content.content:
A major thanks for the backers so far ‚ù§Ô∏è
Starting out stronger than I could have imagined!

3 more weeks to go, much more marketing to do.
Reaching out to artists all over the world is a challenge I didn't expect.

Lets hope for reaching the goal and people believing in the concept, 3 weeks to go!

FolioSeven: your algorithm, A.I. and greed free portfolio.
